title: Placement
content: 200+ Recruiters, Highest CTC (Intl) 24 LPA, Highest CTC (Domestic) 12 LPA, Average CTC (Intl) 24 LPA,Average CTC Overall 4.5 LPA.

title: Research
content: Sona College's commitment to advanced research in the areas of science, engineering and technology has nurtured 36+ centres of excellence. Every department is encouraged to have at least one such centre.

title: Awards
content: Sona has to its credit lots of awards and accolades bestowed upon by various Organizations and Government Bodies.Recent Award(AICTE CII Best Industry Linked Technical Institute in India 2020)

title: Japanese language Training center
content: Knowing another language enriches your personal life,increases your power to act as a citizen of the world.

title: Campus Connect
content: Sona stands tall with the best of the Industry offered Campus Connect initiatives/programmes.

title: Eminent Visitors
content: At Sona, We take immense care to put in the right efforts and work towards achieving excellence. Here are some eminent dignitaries in the field of education and research who have caught a glimpse it.
